      10             : // Enable this pref to turn on compositor performance warning.
      11             : // This will print warnings if the compositor isn't meeting
      12             : // its responsiveness objectives:
      13             : //    1) Compose a frame within 15ms of receiving a ScheduleCompositeCall
      14             : //    2) Unless a frame was composited within the throttle threshold in
      15             : //       which the deadline will be 15ms + throttle threshold

     262             : 
     263             :   /**
     264             :    * Request that the compositor be recreated due to a shared device reset.
     265             :    * This must be called on the main thread, and blocks until a task posted
     266             :    * to the compositor thread has completed.
     267             :    *
     268             :    * Note that this posts a task directly, rather than using synchronous
     269             :    * IPDL, and waits on a monitor notification from the compositor thread.
     270             :    * We do this as a best-effort attempt to jump any IPDL messages that
     271             :    * have not yet been posted (and are sitting around in the IO pipe), to
     272             :    * minimize the amount of time the main thread is blocked.
     273             :    */
     274             :   bool ResetCompositor(const nsTArray<LayersBackend>& aBackendHints,
     275             :                        uint64_t aSeqNo,
     276             :                        TextureFactoryIdentifier* aOutIdentifier);
